department: Department of foreign affairs, trade and development
short_summary: Project monitor for SRHR in Burkin Faso, monitoring progress and advising change.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a project monitor to monitor projects in the Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights (SRHR) sector of Canada’s bilateral development program in Burkina Faso.

full_summary:
**Project Monitor for the Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights Sector in Burkina Faso**
==========================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) | **Competition Type:** Competitive - Selective Tendering | **Posting Date:** March 26, 2024 | **Closing Date:** April 12, 2024, 14:00:00

**Background**
---------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a qualified project monitor to provide strategic support for projects in the Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights sector of Canada's bilateral development program in Burkina Faso.

**Project Objective**
---------------------

The project monitor will be responsible for monitoring two distinct projects in the health sector of Canada's bilateral programming in Burkina Faso and providing timely advice on the necessary changes to achieve the desired deliverables. The successful candidate will provide regular and reliable information on project progress and issues of concern to support decision-makers and other stakeholders.

**Services**
------------

The project monitor will:

* Monitor project progress and provide regular reports to DFATD's decision-makers and implementing partners
* Identify lessons learned, outline potential innovations, and best practices on DFATD's initiatives
* Collaborate with technical specialist expertise, as required
* Provide strategic advice on project management and implementation

**Requirements**
----------------

* The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of project management principles and practices
* Excellent analytical, communication, and reporting skills
* Ability to work collaboratively with various stakeholders, including implementing partners
* Experience in monitoring and evaluating projects in developing countries

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:
Christian Meghaizel, Contracting Officer
Email: [christian.meghaizel@international.gc.ca](mailto:christian.meghaizel@international.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 791-8548 | Fax: None

**Tender Documents**
---------------------

Visit the following website to access the tender documents: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34926/24-246506---npp-tsps---project-monitor---burkina-faso.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34926/24-246506---npp-tsps---project-monitor---burkina-faso.pdf)

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Tender closing date: April 12,
